name: v1.1.2
body: - Fixed issue when theme color is specified with a color literal.

name: v1.1.1
body: - Added support for super long lists.

name: v1.1.0
body:
- Fixed `FastScrollNestedScrollView` scrolling past end when ProGuard is enabled with optimization.
- The `SimpleFastScrollView` class is replaced by `ViewHelperProvider` for this fix.

name: v1.0.4
body: - Fixed setViewHelper() to return FastScrollerBuilder for chaining.

name: v1.0.3
body: - Fixed fast scroll views not being considered as scroll containers.

- Worked around path not convex crash under certain conditions.
- Fixed FastScroller to use AppCompatTextView for popup.

name: v1.0.1
body: - Fixed handling of min touch target width. It is now 48dp as per guidelines, and the same as in ListView FastScroller.
